item.title: 3 x potholes, 26th March
item.description:
There are 3 x potholes in carriageway opposite the entrance to Nuffield Hospital. The one nearest the curb is a collapse from a fix a few years ago. The 2 closer to the central line are new potholes. ///taxi.select.hooks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Ultra Electronics Hatherley Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
